column5: FOR YRS NOW I NEVER DO THE OPENER THING.BUT WAS UP AT SIX TODAY AND IT WAS POURING OUT. I KNEW ONLY THE HARDCORE GUYS BE OUT. MEATHUNTERS AND RUBES ARE MADE OF SUGAR SO I DECIDED TO HEAD OUT. HIT A REAL POPULAR HOLE WHICH IS ALWAYS BUSY ON OPENER. BUT NOT A CAR IN SIGHT FISHED IT ALL TO MYSELF TILL NOON. ENDED UP 14 BOWS ALL SPAWNED OUT AND 1 3LB BROWN WAS AN AWESOME SURPRISE. GLAD IT RAINED OR ID PROB JUST BE GETTIN UP NOW  LOL HOPE EVERYONE HAD A SAFE ONE. MY WIFE WORKS FOR DURHAM POLICE SO I WAS VERY PLEASED TO HEAR HER TELL ME COPS WERE OUT LAST NIGHT GIVIN PEOPLE TICKET FOR FISHING BEFORE 12AM ON OSHAWA CREEK. THUMBS UP TO DURHAM POLICE. THANKS FOR HELPIN OUT THE CO'S. WAS PROB QUOTA WEEK ANYWAYS  LOL
A great report Scott!
Nice going COPPER Sounds like you had them bows dialed in Thanks for sharing Leechman
better than mine I fished for less than a hour and every creek I looked was chocolate milk
Good stuff Scott.  The early bird gets the worm
Nice job, we got into just 1 this morning but the "talk" was that more were caught.   Thanks for sharing, banner day for sure.  MTBF

Betcha the boys are loving the GBay tribs... nice and sunny up here and no sign of the heavy rains folks were all so worried about 5 days back!  Great day out for you Scott ! Thanks for the post... steal the wife's camera next time would ya!

I had a great day as well!!!  For about two hours, I caught a fish on every drift!  Only bad thing that happened today was that the screw on my Islander fell out yet and I couldn't find it.  Good thing I brought a spare reel!!!
Great report Scott BUT You have had yer camera back for 2 months now.WHERES THE PICS.  Im sure the notty will produce some drop backs the next couple weeks,when Im able to get out again.   TFS Scott
TX ALL. CANT FIND THE CORD THAT GOES FROM COMP TO CAMERA  LOL
Then just pull the memory card out of the camera and put it into the computer.
GOT A LAPTOP. NOT A TECHNICAL PERSON.MY IDEA OF FIXING SOMETHING IS HITTIN IT WITH A HAMMER. LOL GONNA GET ONE OF THOSE CARD READERS.
Went to oshawa in the evening and there was no one in sight pretty much all along the creek...kinda surprised.
Alright..  Salvation is at hand!!
Great report, sounds like fun

I was out your way COPPER fishing with a buddy of mine, we were mostly targeting browns and we noticed the samething not a lot of people out until the rain slowed. Of course I did notice on the Friday night a popular place in oshawa had multiple tents pitched. I will never understand these people that stand shoulder to shoulder in what can't be more than 20 by 10 foot pool.

The main reason I stay far away from any of the tribs on opener.  Was much more enjoyable for me to be on an inland lake with plenty of elbow room and peace. That, said...sounds like you had a great opener anyways Copper!!  Good news on the pre-opening bust as well!
If you really do love rain, then you're in for a spectacular week!
lol!!  I am getting out this evening.. I have a feeling that will be it for a while!
BUILDIN MY ARK AS WE SPEAK  LOL WENT OUT THIS MORN AND POPPED 8 AND WENT BACK JUST AN HR AGO AND GOT MY LAST ONE FOR WHATS GONNA LOOK LIKE A WEEK ATLEAST. TIME FOR WII FISHIN THIS WEEK  LOL
